tool_name: Scape social media links of a website
tool_description: This tool allows users to scrape social media links from any specified website, retrieving links for platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest, and YouTube.

api_list.name: Scrape Social Links
api_list.description: This API endpoint scrapes and returns social media links found on the specified website.

required_parameters.name: link
required_parameters.description: The URL of the website from which to scrape social media links.
